title: CEO & CoFounder
organization_short_description: Decisely is reimagining the way brokers and small businesses work together. The Decisely solution provides the best combination of benefits, HR resources, and technology to support small businesses.
subject: Kevin + Secured $60M + SMB retirement
emailBody: Hey Kevin — saw Decisely secure $60M to expand your HR and benefits tech, and that you’ve launched Retirement Solutions for small businesses. I wanted to run something by you since small employers often start retirement or ICHRA setups then stall when admin or cost questions pop up. We run a database reactivation service that re-engages those inactive SMB prospects with light SMS/email sequences tied to your Retirement Solutions and ICHRA updates. For Decisely, it’s a way to revive paused conversations and push enrollments without hiring more sales headcount. Want a 3-minute Loom that shows how it works? No pressure either way. -{{sendingAccountFirstName}}

title: Founder - CEO
organization_short_description: Harbor.ai is an insurance marketplace driven by Artificial Intelligence.
subject: Paul + AI-powered underwriting platform + workflow automation
emailBody: Hey Paul — saw Harbor launch an AI-powered underwriting platform focused on business risk management and workflow automation. Congrats — expanding collaborative workspace features to speed decisions sounds impactful, but I bet teams still see stalled deals when security questions or integration complexity slow evaluations. We run a database reactivation service that re-engages those inactive prospects with light SMS/email tied to product updates and your enhanced security/compliance messaging. For Harbor it’s a way to turn paused underwriting pilots into demo-ready buyers without adding headcount. Want a 3-minute Loom that shows how it works? No pressure either way. -{{sendingAccountFirstName}}

title: Co-Founder & CEO
subject: Dan + $30M Raise + climate homes
emailBody: Hey Dan — saw Stand secure a $30M raise to scale your physics-driven AI for climate-impacted homeowners. I wanted to run something by you since Stand likely has a backlog of paused homeowner quotes and FL Citizens conversions that need low-friction follow-ups. We run a database reactivation service that takes those inactive leads and re-engages them with light SMS/email sequences tied to product updates, rate changes, or new underwriting capabilities. For Stand, it’s a way to convert paused climate-home leads into live policies (especially as you expand in Florida) without adding headcount. Would you like a 3-minute Loom that shows how it works? No pressure either way. -{{sendingAccountFirstName}}

title: CEO and Co-Founder
organization_short_description: Relm Insurance is the leading specialty insurance carrier serving emerging industries, including digital assets & Web3, AI, the space economy, fintech, and beyond. We provide more than just risk protection, we make innovation resilient.
subject: Joseph + Web3 product suite + digital assets
emailBody: Hey Joseph — saw Relm launch a Web3 product suite offering tailored insurance for digital assets and emerging tech clients. With inbound interest around Side A DIC and new Employment Practices coverage, I imagine you’ve got a bunch of paused or cold Web3 leads worried about complexity and niche pricing. We run a database reactivation service that re-engages those inactive prospects with light SMS/email follow-ups tied to product updates and coverage clarifications. For Relm, it’s a way to convert dormant Web3 and DIC/EPC inquiries into active clients without adding headcount. Want a 3-minute Loom showing how it works? No pressure either way. -Alex

title: CEO / Co-founder
organization_short_description:
Technology is disrupting the insurance industry and agencies need to take the initiative if they want to remain competitive in the upcoming disruption. COVU takes a holistic approach to ensure that the agency thrives by delivering a great customer experience through a combination of technology, real-time service, and sales support. 

Agency's book experiences higher retention and more cross-sales leading to higher profitability for its owner(s). Agency producers get more time to prospect and sell to new higher-value customers.
subject: Ali + Raised $16 million in new funding + agency acquisitions
emailBody: Hey Ali — saw Covu raised $16 million to expand its AI-native platform and that you’re accelerating agency acquisitions. With multi-agency deals and partner exits, I imagine you’re juggling onboarding, integrating agency pipelines, and a ton of paused opportunities from acquired books. We run a database reactivation service that re-engages inactive leads and partner contacts with light SMS/email tied to platform updates and acquisition messaging. For Covu, it’s an efficient way to convert dormant agency referrals and acquired prospects into active clients without extra headcount. Want a 3-minute Loom that shows how it works? No pressure either way. -{{sendingAccountFirstName}}
